roleset.name: behaving violently

example.name: violent-j: arg1
example.text: But from what i 've observed via TSR and many news sources ; the way they 're trying to achieve them , is largely violent EDIT : specific coverage of EDL , whom seem to make the headlines a little more .

propbank.arg: from what i 've observed via TSR and many news sources
the way they 're trying to achieve them

example.name: violent-j: args 0, 2
example.text: " I was violent toward everybody because I hated myself and I wanted them to feel the pain I felt at the time . " Mike Tyson .

propbank.arg: because I hated myself and I wanted them to feel the pain I felt at the time

example.name: violent-j: arg1
example.text: The American government has paid for numerous research efforts to determine if video games are violent

example.name: violence-n: arg2
example.text: Violence against women and girls is a grave violation of human rights .
